name: A Study in Steampunk: Choice by Gaslight
description: Steam-powered mechs meet forbidden sorcery in this interactive steampunk novel, inspired by Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, Jekyll & Hyde, and Jack the Ripper!

reviews.review_text: I love all the games offered by Choice of Games, but this is by far my favorite. Every choice you make feels like it has weight and impact on the story, while still flowing together to create a whole narrative. The character you play as feels like a real person and rather than making descions based on numbers or what will bring the best outcome I found myself thinking 'What would he do under the circumstances?' I just can't recommend this game enough to anyone who enjoys story-based games.

I was never a fan of these types of games but always longed to secretly try one of them!! Glad I found this one, a favorite genre of mine,steampunk, was the best choic i could have made. Not only is this fun but it is well written and believable!! I completely recommend this masterpiece and encourage the people behind it to write more in the future. Now i am a bonafide fan of this type of game/story/book and adventure. A+

I absolutely love this game! Although I did miss that it doesn't have graphics or drawings, the writing is so wonderful and detailed! I think there was only one instance that a decision I wanted to make wasn't already listed, and I usually want to make odd choices! So I was quite happy with what they had! There is also the replay value! So many avenues you can take your stories and try again to see where they lead! This is a highly recommended game!
An extremly fun and entertaining story.

This is a very fun game. It's long, branched out, and there is consequences for choices made. Plus it's steampuck. How awesome is that? It's one of my top 3 games and I give it a 10/10. The only games that are equal to this game are zombies exodus, choice of robots, and Tin Star. So if you had to choose between any games that are not those, and Steampunk, I would choose Steampunk,
If you enjoy reading, and choice your own adventure games buy this game. The price is right even if you only play it thru once.
